import React from 'react' import HeartEmpty from '../images/heart_empty.gif' import HeartFull from '../images/heart_full.gif' import '../styles/CharityCard.css'; export default class CharityCard extends React.Component{ render(){ console.log(this.props) return(
x
ORGANIZATION'S NAME
{this.props.charity.charity_name}
ORGANIZATION'S TAG LINE
{this.props.charity.tag_line}
ORGANIZATION'S MISSION
{this.props.charity.mission}
ORGANIZATION'S CAUSE
{this.props.charity.cause}
ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE
{this.props.charity.website_url}
RATING:  {this.props.charity.current_rating}
) } }
